name: Qu-tros (Tetris to the 4th Power)
description:
Qu-tros is basically for Tetris masters.

Qu-tros has up to 4 shapes falling simultaneously.

There are about 75 different shapes.

There are surprise items and obstacles.

There are currently 3 game modes: Classic 1D mode, 2Dimensions mode, and Blackhole mode.

Link to High Scores: https://www.entertainment-calculator.com/qu-tros-high-scores
